Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Its what you can expect from ny. They put too much salt on the dough though.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: The pizza is tasty and cheap. 10 euros for a full, small size pizza ( 6 slices, more than enough for one person). The only problem is that you can't sit here and eat, they don't allow it. So you either sit outside on a bench or take away. Since this is close to my house, I thought it's better to just order in from next time onwards.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: don't bother ordering. you will be receiving a below average pizza after 90 min.

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Pizza was delivered too dry last orders. Used to like the place. Pleas stop saving on sauce :)

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Delicious with great toppings and a discount on Tuesdays. You may not listen to a 12 year old but I really Recommend New York pizza as your pizzaria...

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Best pizza ever! You can say it's a matter of taste, but this one fits perfectly to all my expectations!

Name: New York Pizza
Review Text: Great taste. We ordered it there and sat on the bench because you can't sit in the restaurant.
